languages.text: Increases the {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of Malice's next attack and makes this attack ignore the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}. However, this attack makes every enemy who survives this attack strike back at Malice.
languages.original_text: Увеличивает {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитие брони{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} от следующей атаки Злобы, а также позволяет этой атаке игнорировать {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парирование{/g} цели. Однако такой безрассудный удар провоцируют всех врагов, кто пережил эту атаку, ударить Злобу в ответ.

traits.locale_text: Increases the {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and damage of Malice's next attack and makes this attack ignore the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}. However, this attack makes every enemy who survives this attack strike back at Malice.

Increases the {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of Malice's next attack and makes this attack ignore the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}. However, this attack makes every enemy who survives this attack strike back at Malice.

Increases the {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of Malice's next attack and makes this attack ignore the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}. However, this attack makes every enemy who survives this attack strike back at Malice.

languages.text: Увеличивает {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитие брони{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} от следующей атаки Злобы, а также позволяет этой атаке игнорировать {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парирование{/g} цели. Однако такой безрассудный удар провоцируют всех врагов, кто пережил эту атаку, ударить Злобу в ответ.
マリスの次の攻撃の{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通力{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を増加し、この攻撃はターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}を無視する。しかし、この攻撃で生き残った敵はすべてマリスに反撃する。
languages.original_text: Increases the {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of Malice's next attack and makes this attack ignore the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}. However, this attack makes every enemy who survives this attack strike back at Malice.

traits.locale_text: マリスの次の攻撃の{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通力{/g}とダメージを増加し、この攻撃はターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}を無視する。しかし、この攻撃で生き残った敵は全てマリスに反撃する。

languages.text: 恶棍下次攻击的{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高，同时忽视目标的{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}。然而，如果敌人闪避了此次攻击，会立刻对恶棍进行反击。
languages.original_text: Increases the {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of Malice's next attack and makes this attack ignore the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}. However, this attack makes every enemy who survives this attack strike back at Malice.

traits.locale_text: 恶棍下次攻击的{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}与伤害提高，同时忽视目标的{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}。然而，如果敌人闪避了此次攻击，会立刻对恶棍进行反击。

languages.text: Aumenta la {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g} y el {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} del siguiente ataque de Malicia y permite que su siguiente ataque ignore la {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parada{/g} del objetivo. Sin embargo, cualquier enemigo que sobreviva al ataque le devolverá el golpe a Malicia.
languages.original_text: Increases the {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of Malice's next attack and makes this attack ignore the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}. However, this attack makes every enemy who survives this attack strike back at Malice.

traits.locale_text: Aumenta la {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g} y el daño del siguiente ataque de Malicia y permite que su siguiente ataque ignore la {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parada{/g} del objetivo. Sin embargo, cualquier enemigo que sobreviva al ataque le devolverá el golpe a Malicia.

languages.text: Erhöht die {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g} und den {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} des nächsten Angriffs von Tücke und ignoriert {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parieren{/g} des Ziels. Dieser Angriffermöglicht allerdings jedem Feind, der ihn überlebt, einen Gegenangriff auf Tücke.
languages.original_text: Increases the {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of Malice's next attack and makes this attack ignore the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}. However, this attack makes every enemy who survives this attack strike back at Malice.

traits.locale_text: Erhöht die {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g} und den Schaden des nächsten Angriffs von Bosheit und lässt diesen Angriff {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parieren{/g} des Zieles ignorieren. Dieser Angriff lässt jedoch jeden Feind, der diesen Angriff überlebt, einen Gegenschlag auf Bosheit ausführen.

languages.text: Augmente la {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g} et les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} de l'attaque suivante de Malice, et fait en sorte que cette attaque ignore la {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parade{/g} de la cible. Cette attaque oblige cependant tous les ennemis qui y survivent à riposter contre Malice.
languages.original_text: Increases the {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of Malice's next attack and makes this attack ignore the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}. However, this attack makes every enemy who survives this attack strike back at Malice.

traits.locale_text: Augmente la {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g} et les dégâts de l'attaque suivante de Démon, et fait en sorte que cette attaque ignore la {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parade{/g} de la cible. Cette attaque oblige cependant tous les ennemis qui y survivent à riposter contre Démon.

languages.text: Melanet'in bir sonraki saldırısının {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}zırh delme{/g} değerini ve verdiği {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasarı{/g} artırır, saldırının hedefin {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}savuşturma{/g} değerini yok saymasına neden olur. Ancak saldırıdan sağ çıkan düşmanların hepsi, Melanet'e karşı saldırıda bulunur.
languages.original_text: Increases the {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of Malice's next attack and makes this attack ignore the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}. However, this attack makes every enemy who survives this attack strike back at Malice.
